unnormalised: Campus hiring at IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad remains crucial for talent acquisition. Dr. Sharma's insights on optimizing the process are valuable. The Rs. 50,000 package seems competitive, but consider housing options given Mumbai's high cost. Our firm needs fresh minds to innovate in our new 2000 sq ft Bangalore office. A placement drive focusing on Indian values could attract more culturally aligned candidates.
